predicate.note: Frames file for 'commute' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: go back and forth to/from work

example.name: arg1 as start point
example.text: Of Bechtel's 17,500 employees, about 4,000 work in San Francisco -- one-third of them commuting from stricken East Bay.

example.name: arg1 as both points
example.text: Mr. Rosenblatt said he resigned because of difficulties with [*] commuting between his home in New York and the magazine's editorial offices in Washington.
example.arg: [ his home in New York] [ and] [ the magazine's editorial offices in Washington]

example.name: separated points
example.text: Every day, John commutes from Heaven to Hell.

roleset.name: make a law sentence more lenient

example.name: no resurrection yet
example.text: The judge commuted Mary's sentence for killing John to 'time served,' saying that John really did have it coming.
example.arg: saying that John really did have it coming
